member.name: DML_FEATURE_QUERY_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Used to query a DirectML device for its support for a particular data type within tensors. See . The query type is DML_FEATURE_QUERY_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT, and the support data type is .

member.name: DML_FEATURE_QUERY_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT.DataType
member.summary: The data type about which you're querying for support.
